leads.lead_text: Pappus scales usually c. 1 mm long; bract-leaves mostly longer than capitula; florets usually purplish; probably not in Victoria, see note following genus description
Pappus scales less than 0.5 mm long; bract-leaves mostly shorter than capitula; florets usually bright azure-blue
